summary: The backend package defines a generic abstract interface and concrete implementations for handling a variety of document formats (PDF, HTML, markdown, Word, PowerPoint, etc.). Each backend validates input, manages pagination, extracts structural elements, renders page images, and converts the source material into Docling's unified document model, while also providing cleanup and resource management utilities.
business_intent: To supply a pluggable, format‑agnostic layer that transforms heterogeneous source documents into a consistent internal representation, enabling downstream analytics, indexing, and AI‑driven processing across all supported file types.
